mapper.select: SELECT A.PJT_CD as PJT_CD, A.SCV_PART as SCV_PART, A.EXCHANGE_NO as EXCHANGE_NO, B.CUST_NM as CUST_NM, A.EX_WORK_AMT as EX_WORK_AMT FROM T_P11070 A, T_AC0300 B, T_P11000 C, (SELECT ORDER_YY, ORDER_SEQ, PJT_CD, OUT_ITEM, CUST_CD, RMK FROM T_P16000 WHERE PJT_CD = #{pjtCd}) D WHERE A.EXCHANGE_NO *= B.CUST_CD AND A.PJT_CD *= C.PJT_CD AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND A.PJT_CD *= D.PJT_CD ORDER BY A.PJT_CD, A.SCV_PART, A.EXCHANGE_NO
